type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">if (world instanceof ServerLevel _level) {&#10;    double centerX = entity.getX();&#10;    double centerY = entity.getY() + 1;&#10;    double centerZ = entity.getZ();&#10;    int numParticles = 100;  // Total number of particles&#10;    double speed = 0.2;      // Speed of particles&#10;&#10;    for (int i = 0; i < numParticles; i++) {&#10;        double angleXY = 2 * Math.PI * i / numParticles;&#10;        double angleXZ = Math.PI * i / numParticles;&#10;        &#10;        double offsetX = speed * Math.cos(angleXY) * Math.sin(angleXZ);&#10;        double offsetY = speed * Math.sin(angleXY) * Math.sin(angleXZ);&#10;        double offsetZ = speed * Math.cos(angleXZ);&#10;&#10;        _level.sendParticles(&#10;            ParticleTypes.TOTEM_OF_UNDYING,&#10;            centerX, centerY, centerZ,&#10;            1,  // Number of particles per spawn&#10;            offsetX, offsetY, offsetZ, 0.5  // Particle speed and spread&#10;        );&#10;    }&#10;}&#10;</field><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">ABSORPTION</field><value name="level"><block
